sentences.en: A perverse man stirs up dissension, and a gossip separates close friends.
sentences.cn: 28乖僻人播散分争.传舌的离间密友.

sentences.en: An angry man stirs up dissension , and atempered one commits many sins.
sentences.cn: 容易发怒的人, 引起纷争;脾气暴烈的人,多有过犯.

sentences.en: Even Jordan's party; the quartet from East Egg, were rent asunder by dissension.
sentences.cn: 连乔丹的那一伙,从东卵来的那四位, 也由于意见不和而四分五裂了.

sentences.en: His words caused a great deal of dissension among his followers.
sentences.cn: 他的话在他的追随者之间引起了激烈争吵.

sentences.en: In the past the voice of dissension had been quickly snuffed out.
sentences.cn: 在过去不同的意见都很快被压制下去.

sentences.en: In the past the voice of dissension has been quickly snuffed out.
sentences.cn: 在过去不同的意见都很快被“压制”下去.

sentences.en: It undermines cohesion and creates dissension.
sentences.cn: 这件事会破坏团结,制造纠纷.

sentences.en: It was hobbled first by incompetence and internal dissension.
sentences.cn: 开始时,它由于无能和内部纠纷而行动缓慢.

sentences.en: The group dissolved in dissension within a few years.
sentences.cn: 不到几年,那团体因为内部不和而解散.
那个团体因内部不和而解散.

sentences.en: The Labour Party was torn by internal dissensions .
sentences.cn: 工党因内部纷争产生分裂。

sentences.en: These little rows were really precipitated by an atmosphere which was surcharged with dissension.
sentences.cn: 这些小吵小闹其实是由充满不和的气氛造成的.

sentences.en: This created tension and dissension among the team members.
sentences.cn: 这就导致整个团队起了冲突和纷争.

sentences.en: While you preach peace, you make it the business of your life to stir up dissension.
sentences.cn: 你一边宣传和平, 一边又利用和平来干你煽动纷争的营生.

sentences.en: Widespread lay - offs from state - owned enterprises have already caused dissension there.
sentences.cn: 国企的 下岗 工人到处都是,已经使那儿纷纷扰扰.

words.tran_cn: 纠纷；意见不合；争吵；倾轧

trans.tran_en: disagreement among a group of people
